title: Is 'man flu' real?
description: Can science prove the existence of 'man flu' or are men just big babies? Dan and Neil discuss all this and give you six useful items of vocabulary.

vocabItems.definition: when a person's nose leaks mucus
the situation where a person, often a man, tends to complain and exaggerate a small illness such as a cold
whining complaining repeatedly often in an annoying waysymptomsfeelings of illness caused by a disease
